title: Execute Integration Test Suite
description: As a QA engineer, I want to run comprehensive integration tests so that I can verify system components work together correctly.
soThat: I can verify system components work together correctly
acceptanceCriteria: Given test environment is ready, when integration tests run, then all critical paths pass
Given component dependencies exist, when tests execute, then inter-service communication works
Given test data is prepared, when validation runs, then expected results are produced
